snippet: The Arkansas secretary of state’s office has denied a request from the Universal Society of Hinduism to place a privately funded Hindu statue on Capitol grounds.
lead_paragraph: The Arkansas secretary of state’s office has denied a request from the Universal Society of Hinduism to place a privately funded Hindu statue on Capitol grounds.

headline.main: Arkansas Rejects Request for Hindu Statue at Capitol
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Rejects Request For Hindu Statue at Capitol
